column4: quick question, i was talking to someone about nvidia drivers yesterday, and they said there are actually 2: the binary ones and there are free ones (novou, or something like that) does anyone know the name of the free driver, or know how well it works compared to the binary ones?
defDfloyd wine was under development for 15 years...how well do they run compared to the nvidia binaries? =)
how am I suppose to know I don't use nouveau since I don't care about GPL
